com.koverse.sdk.data.field.schema.flat.FlatCollectionSchema

  • Packages that use FlatCollectionSchema 
    Package Description
    com.koverse.sdk.data.field.schema
    Contains components related to the schema of a record or a collection of records in a data set.
    com.koverse.sdk.sql.convert
    Contains internal use components for converting records to and from SQL types.
    com.koverse.sdk.transform.spark  
    com.koverse.sdk.transform.spark.sql
    Spark SQL based transforms.
